topic.title: TRANSFERRED FOR FURTHER CARE TYPE (NATIONAL NEONATAL DATA SET)
topic.shortdesc: The type of care a baby is being transferred for, where the DISCHARGE DESTINATION FROM NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE is recorded as National Code 'Transferred to aHospital Site of anotherORGANISATION for further care', for the purposes of the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care.
